headline: Is Booking Holdings (BKNG) Attractive After Recent Pullback And Travel Demand Focus?
summary: If you are asking yourself whether Booking Holdings at around US$5,001.84 is still a reasonable entry or more of a hold, you are in the right place. The stock has pulled back recently, with a 1.9% decline over the last 7 days and a 6.6% decline over the last 30 days, despite a 6.4% return over the past year and a 142.5% return over 5 years. Recent news has largely focused on travel demand trends and Booking Holdings ongoing role as a major online travel player. This frames how investors are...
